children.value: üöÄ Welcome to
hummingbot
version 0.20.0! In this release, we mainly addressed several bugs. Separately from the
hummingbot
client, the team has been hard at work on the Liquidity Mining infrastructure, with campaigns on target for a mid-February launch.
ü§ñ UI Update
We have added a feature that allows you to encrypt and decrypt your exchange API keys. For more information, visit
Connecting to Exchange
üåä‚õè Liquidity mining update

In mid February 2020, we plan to launch liquidity mining campaigns for our launch partners on 0x Mesh and Binance. There will be approximately US $3,000-$8,000 per month in rewards for liquidity miners to earn in each campaign.
Also, we recently released a blog explaining how liquidity mining rewards are calculated on our new platform. For more information, read through our blog posts:
Liquidity Mining Launch Update
Demystifying Liquidity Mining Rewards
üîó Connectors update
Finished Liquid.com exchange connector (Thanks to
@zeitgeistf
Finished Bitcoin.com exchange connector (Thanks to
@nionis
Bamboo Relay upgraded to 0x v3 protocol and can now be used with Hummingbot.
ü§ì Developer usability
Added explanation in the developer documentation for being specific when auto-completing exchange names. Read more in config definition conventions.
üêû Other bug fixes and miscellaneous updates
Thanks to everyone who reported bugs!
Note that we pay bug bounties to anyone who reports a bug that we end up fixing.
Fixed price calculation when trading BUSD stablecoin:
Fixed unexpected keyword argument 'trading_pairs' in Bamboo Relay:
Fixed bug in Bittrex where inventory skew creates order sizes lower than the minimum trade size/value:
Fixed auto-complete bug on prompts with the word ‚Äòexchange‚Äô even when it‚Äôs not supposed to:
Fixed errors fetching new events from ERC20 contracts when trading SAI in DDEX and Radar Relay:
Fixed Bamboo Relay SSL error when running on Windows:
Fixed error running performance analysis when sending history command:
Fixed error parsing trading pair with new token RUB in Binance:
Fixed default values not working for some parameters in the pure market making:
Refactored pure market-making strategy‚Äôs penny jumping mode to best bid-ask jumping
Updated Bamboo Relay changing ‚Äòsymbol‚Äô to ‚Äòtrading_pairs‚Äô
Updated Dolomite changing ‚Äòsymbol‚Äô to ‚Äòtrading_pairs‚Äô
üöÄ Coming soon
Here's what we are currently working on that we expect to ship in the next 2-6 weeks:
Developer tutorial on building custom strategies
KuCoin
connector
